title: VoiceOps AI Assistant
problem: Support teams were losing hours triaging repetitive customer requests across channels.
solution: Built a multilingual AI assistant with retrieval-based responses and ticket automation.
results: 42% faster resolution time, 31% reduction in support costs within 60 days.

title: WorkflowPilot Automation
problem: Operations relied on manual handoffs between CRM, invoicing, and fulfillment systems.
solution: Developed an event-driven automation engine connecting internal tools and third-party APIs.
results: Saved 120+ team hours per month and cut process errors by 67%.

title: FinSight SaaS Platform
problem: A fintech startup needed an enterprise-grade product to onboard and retain B2B clients.
solution: Engineered a secure SaaS platform with analytics dashboards, role-based access, and billing.
results: Reached product-market fit in 4 months with 3x increase in trial-to-paid conversion.

title: InsightGrid Data Platform
problem: Executives lacked real-time visibility into sales and operational performance.
solution: Built a unified data layer and AI insight module with forecast and anomaly detection.
results: Improved forecasting accuracy to 91% and reduced reporting lag from days to minutes.
